trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory developer's guide | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory developer's guide | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: This article provides a comprehensive guide to developer-oriented resources for Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: This article provides a comprehensive guide to developer-oriented resources for Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: As an identity management as a service (IDMaaS) platform, Azure Active Directory provides developers an effective way to integrate identity management into their applications.
trans-unit.target: As an identity management as a service (IDMaaS) platform, Azure Active Directory provides developers an effective way to integrate identity management into their applications.

trans-unit.source: The following articles provide overviews on implementation and key features of Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: The following articles provide overviews on implementation and key features of Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: We suggest that you read them in order, or jump to <link><linkText>Getting started</linkText><title></title></link> if you're ready to dig in.
trans-unit.target: We suggest that you read them in order, or jump to <link><linkText>Getting started</linkText><title></title></link> if you're ready to dig in.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Integrating with Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title></link>: Discover why integration with Azure Active Directory offers the best solution for secure sign-in and authorization.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Integrating with Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title></link>: Discover why integration with Azure Active Directory offers the best solution for secure sign-in and authorization.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Active Directory authentication scenarios</linkText><title></title></link>: Take advantage of simplified authentication in Azure Active Directory to provide sign-on to your application.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Active Directory authentication scenarios</linkText><title></title></link>: Take advantage of simplified authentication in Azure Active Directory to provide sign-on to your application.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory Graph API</linkText><title></title></link>: Use the Azure Active Directory Graph API to programmatically access Azure Active Directory through REST API endpoints.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory Graph API</linkText><title></title></link>: Use the Azure Active Directory Graph API to programmatically access Azure Active Directory through REST API endpoints.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Integrating applications in Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title></link>: Learn about registering your application and the branding guidelines for multitenant applications.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Integrating applications in Azure Active Directory</linkText><title></title></link>: Learn about registering your application and the branding guidelines for multitenant applications.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory authentication libraries</linkText><title></title></link>: Easily authenticate users to obtain access tokens by using the Azure authentication libraries.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory authentication libraries</linkText><title></title></link>: Easily authenticate users to obtain access tokens by using the Azure authentication libraries.

trans-unit.source: To view Azure Active Directory overviews presented at the Build 2015 conference, see the <link><linkText>Videos</linkText><title></title></link> section below.
trans-unit.target: To view Azure Active Directory overviews presented at the Build 2015 conference, see the <link><linkText>Videos</linkText><title></title></link> section below.

trans-unit.source: These tutorials are tailored for multiple platforms and can help you quickly start developing with Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: These tutorials are tailored for multiple platforms and can help you quickly start developing with Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: As a prerequisite, you must <link><linkText>get an Azure Active Directory tenant</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: As a prerequisite, you must <link><linkText>get an Azure Active Directory tenant</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Mobile and PC application quick-start guides
trans-unit.target: Mobile and PC application quick-start guides

trans-unit.source: Web application and web API quick-start guides
trans-unit.target: Web application and web API quick-start guides

trans-unit.source: These articles describe how to perform specific tasks by using Azure Active Directory:
trans-unit.target: These articles describe how to perform specific tasks by using Azure Active Directory:

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>How to get an Azure Active Directory tenant</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Listing your application in the Azure Active Directory application gallery</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Submit web apps for Office 365 to the Seller Dashboard</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Preview: How to build apps that sign users in with both personal & work or school accounts</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Preview: How to build apps that sign users in with both personal & work or school accounts</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: These articles provide a foundation reference for REST and authentication library APIs, protocols, errors, code samples, and endpoints.
trans-unit.target: These articles provide a foundation reference for REST and authentication library APIs, protocols, errors, code samples, and endpoints.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Tagged questions</linkText><title></title></link>: Find Azure Active Directory solutions on Stack Overflow by searching for the tags <link><linkText>azure-active-directory</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>adal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Tagged questions</linkText><title></title></link>: Find Azure Active Directory solutions on Stack Overflow by searching for the tags <link><linkText>azure-active-directory</linkText><title></title></link> and <link><linkText>adal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory open-source libraries</linkText><title></title></link>: The easiest way to find a library’s source is by using our <link><linkText>library list</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory open-source libraries</linkText><title></title></link>: The easiest way to find a library’s source is by using our <link><linkText>library list</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory samples</linkText><title></title></link>: The easiest way to navigate the list of samples is by using the <link><linkText>index of code samples</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory samples</linkText><title></title></link>: The easiest way to navigate the list of samples is by using the <link><linkText>index of code samples</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Graph API reference</linkText><title></title></link>: REST reference for the Azure Active Directory Graph API.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Graph API reference</linkText><title></title></link>: REST reference for the Azure Active Directory Graph API.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Graph API permission scopes</linkText><title></title></link>: OAuth 2.0 permission scopes that are used to control the access that an app has to directory data in a tenant.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Graph API permission scopes</linkText><title></title></link>: OAuth 2.0 permission scopes that are used to control the access that an app has to directory data in a tenant.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>SAML 2.0 protocol reference</linkText><title></title></link>: The SAML 2.0 protocol enables applications to provide a single sign-on experience to their users.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>SAML 2.0 protocol reference</linkText><title></title></link>: The SAML 2.0 protocol enables applications to provide a single sign-on experience to their users.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>OAuth 2.0 protocol reference</linkText><title></title></link>: You can use the OAuth 2.0 protocol to authorize access to web applications and web APIs in your Azure Active Directory tenant.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>OAuth 2.0 protocol reference</linkText><title></title></link>: You can use the OAuth 2.0 protocol to authorize access to web applications and web APIs in your Azure Active Directory tenant.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>OpenID Connect 1.0 protocol reference</linkText><title></title></link>: The OpenID Connect 1.0 protocol extends OAuth 2.0 for use as an authentication protocol.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>OpenID Connect 1.0 protocol reference</linkText><title></title></link>: The OpenID Connect 1.0 protocol extends OAuth 2.0 for use as an authentication protocol.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>WS-Federation 1.2 protocol reference</linkText><title></title></link>: The WS-Federation 1.2 protocol is specified in the Web Services Federation Version 1.2 Specification.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>WS-Federation 1.2 protocol reference</linkText><title></title></link>: The WS-Federation 1.2 protocol is specified in the Web Services Federation Version 1.2 Specification.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Supported token and claim types</linkText><title></title></link>: You can use this guide to understand and evaluate the claims in the SAML 2.0 and JSON Web Tokens (JWT) tokens.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Supported token and claim types</linkText><title></title></link>: You can use this guide to understand and evaluate the claims in the SAML 2.0 and JSON Web Tokens (JWT) tokens.

trans-unit.source: These overview presentations on developing apps by using Azure Active Directory feature speakers who work directly in the engineering team.
trans-unit.target: These overview presentations on developing apps by using Azure Active Directory feature speakers who work directly in the engineering team.

trans-unit.source: The presentations cover fundamental topics, including IDMaaS, authentication, identity federation, and single sign-on.
trans-unit.target: The presentations cover fundamental topics, including IDMaaS, authentication, identity federation, and single sign-on.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Friday</linkText><title></title></link> is a recurring Friday 1:1 video series that's dedicated to bringing you short (10–15 minutes) interviews with experts on a variety of Azure topics.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure Friday</linkText><title></title></link> is a recurring Friday 1:1 video series that's dedicated to bringing you short (10–15 minutes) interviews with experts on a variety of Azure topics.

trans-unit.source: Use the Services Filter feature on the page to see all Azure Active Directory videos.
trans-unit.target: Use the Services Filter feature on the page to see all Azure Active Directory videos.

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Active Directory Team blog</linkText><title></title></link>: The latest developments in the world of Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure Active Directory Graph Team blog</linkText><title></title></link>: Azure Active Directory information that's specific to the Graph API.
